short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow the ability to change the CDN location on the fly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows the user to change the CDN URL for the deployed bundle, thereby allowing a developer to host their own bundles in order to test/debug changes before merging them in..
